pr_title: [issue 8337][Worker] Move initialize dlog namespace metadata to bin/pulsar

timeline.bodyText: Don't remove the code immediately. Please add a flag in Function worker config to control whether do we need to initialize dlog namespace or not. By default, we can make it true (to initialize dlog namespace) for backward compatibility consideration and allow people to turn it off.
